title: Flatbread Pizza
typeOfFood: Lacto, American, Pizza, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. This restaurant houses a real and large clay oven, and you can watch pizzas being made. Menu features several flat bread pizzas, an organic salad with option of add-ons, drinks, and dessert with egg & dairy. All pizzas contain dairy except for one red sauce vegan pizza, labeled as "vegan, no cheese." Spacious inside.
